alert.note: Alert for Barton; Ellsworth; Lincoln; Rice; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 12 at 3:02AM CDT until October 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR EXTREME GRASSLAND FIRE DANGER FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 032, 033, 047, 048, AND 050... The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a Red Flag Warning for extreme grassland fire danger, which is in effect from 9 AM this morning to 7 PM CDT this evening. * Extreme Grassland Fire Danger...Is forecast. * Winds...South 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 19 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and become very difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this fire weather product.
